comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; Win64; x64; rv:9.0a1) Gecko/20110821 Firefox/9.0a1
Build ID: 20110821030758

Steps to reproduce:

selected part of a url in the navbar, and right clicked


Actual results:

there was no option to open it in a new tab/window


Expected results:

there to be an option for it to open in a new tab/window, like in a normal web document
comments.author: rockachu2@gmail.com
